definitions.definition: Any ungulate mammal with an even number of toes and belonging to the Artiodactyla , including pigs , sheep , deer , cattle , and most grazing animals. In contrast, horses have an odd number of toes and as such are not Artiodactyla, but Perissodactyla .

main_definition: ( zoology ) Any ungulate mammal with an even number of toes and belonging to the Artiodactyla , including pigs , sheep , deer , cattle , and most grazing animals. In contrast, horses have an odd number of toes and as such are not Artiodactyla, but Perissodactyla . [from 19th c.]
